Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public abstract class Client extends Object
Client class used to manage the connection and communication of a client
